name: Auth0
description: A cloud-based identity management API for secure authentication and authorization across web, mobile, IoT, and internal applications

about.overview: Auth0 API, part of Oktaâ€™s identity platform, provides developers with tools for secure user authentication and authorization, supporting Single Sign-On (SSO), social login, passwordless authentication, and fine-grained authorization for applications and IoT devices.
features: Social login with over 30 providers (e.g., Google, Facebook)
Passwordless authentication via email, SMS, or biometrics
useCases: Securing web and mobile apps with user authentication
Enabling passwordless login for IoT devices
Managing access control for APIs and microservices

endpoints.description: Obtain an access token for authentication
Retrieve user profile information using an access token

codeSnippets.javascript:
const axios = require('axios');
axios.post('https://YOUR_DOMAIN.auth0.com/oauth/token', { client_id: 'YOUR_CLIENT_ID', client_secret: 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET', grant_type: 'client_credentials' }, { headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json' } }).then(res => console.log(res.data));

quickStart: Sign up at https://auth0.com/signup to create an account
Create an application in the Auth0 Dashboard to obtain client ID and secret
Make a POST request to https://YOUR_DOMAIN.auth0.com/oauth/token to get an access token

authentication.description: Use OAuth 2.0 authentication by obtaining an access token with client ID and secret via the /oauth/token endpoint.
